function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Improvement 1: The distance of the weights from the balance pivot can affect the tipping direction. 
    New Feature 6: left_moment | left_moment = Left-Weight * Left-Distance
    New Feature 7: right_moment | right_moment = Right-Weight * Right-Distance
    
    Improvement 2: The difference in moments on each side relative to the total moment may indicate the tipping direction.
    New Feature 8: moment_difference | moment_difference = abs(left_moment - right_moment)
    New Feature 9: moment_ratio | moment_ratio = left_moment / (left_moment + right_moment)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate moments on each side
    df_output['left_moment'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] * df_output['Left-Distance']
    df_output['right_moment'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] * df_output['Right-Distance']
    
    # Calculate moment metrics
    df_output['moment_difference'] = abs(df_output['left_moment'] - df_output['right_moment'])
    df_output['moment_ratio'] = df_output['left_moment'] / (df_output['left_moment'] + df_output['right_moment'])
    
    return df_output
